name: Detect Anomalies
description: Detect performance, behavioral, coverage, and error anomalies

movements.name: Detect Anomalies

beats.title: Detection Requested
beats.scenario: Detect or Identify detect Anomalies Requested
acceptanceCriteria:
Given the detectAnomaliesRequested operation is triggered
When the handler executes
Then it completes successfully within < 30 seconds
And the output is valid and meets schema
And any required events are published

Given valid input parameters
When detectAnomaliesRequested processes them
Then results conform to expected schema
And no errors are thrown
And telemetry events are recorded with latency metrics

Given error conditions
When detectAnomaliesRequested encounters an error
Then the error is logged with full context
And appropriate recovery is attempted
And the system remains stable

Given performance SLA of < 30 seconds
When detectAnomaliesRequested executes
Then latency is consistently within target
And throughput meets baseline requirements
And resource usage stays within bounds

Given compliance and governance
When detectAnomaliesRequested operates
Then all governance rules are enforced
And audit trails capture execution
And no compliance violations occur
beats.testCase: should achieve the desired business outcome
beats.userStory: As an operations system, I want detectAnomaliesRequested to execute reliably with latency < 30 seconds so that dependent services meet their SLA targets (goal: 99.9% success rate).

movements.userStory: As an SRE, I need anomaly detection to process telemetry streams within ≤1s P95, flagging deviations with confidence scores and publishing alerts.
movements.businessValue: Reduces MTTR by 70%; enables proactive issue resolution; prevents customer impact; improves system stability by 40%
